I purchased some accessories from them and their return policy is very unfriendly. Overall I wont recommend.
The safe should have had the foam inserts sold with it. It’s silly that a small gun safe at this price point wouldn’t include the proper equipment to keep your firearm secure.

Review.Titre: I picked this up because of the new…
Review.Contenu: I picked this up because of the new ability of excepting pistols with red dots. I tried it for my P220 or my G17 both of which have red dots. Didn’t work using it in the forward position had to use it backwards with the slide of the pistol facing the front of the safe.

Not made in America! LifePod 2.0 SE is a well-built safe, and I would buy from this company again only if they brought their factory production back to the United States. To me, it just does not seem right to be storing my American-made pistol... in a Chinese-built gun safe.

I'm a little disappointed. Monday 7/24/22 at 5am EST I could not connect to my safe via the iOS app. I was able to open the door via bio-metrics and combination. I went to work at 7am. at around 7:15am, i received a tamper alert and the iOS app would not show the door was locked, just showed tamper. I had to leave work and go back home to find the door was indeed locked.I opened the safe, checked it and closed the door. Everything went back to normal. The iOS app showed the door was locked. This was a huge inconvenience. Can we possibly diagnose the issue?Regards,John

Solid, Nice size.  “Beep” feature is barely audible.  Printed instructions in manual not accurate.  Can be frustrating to set up.  Follow below tips to ease set-up frustrations.  Use online video to setup.  More accurate. And makes setting biometric and codes much easier to update.Also please be sure to position finger(s) correctly on fingerprint reader to capture your actual fingerprint.
Safe is fine. Interface with app does not work.

Review.Titre: Don't trust your life to it.
Review.Contenu: Design and function are fantastic, but the battery life is terrible. Even when not opened much at all, the battery seems to die quickly. If you have a need for rapid acquisition of your firearm and the safe battery is dead, so are you. Leaving it plugged in may not be a possibility depending on location. I have replaced battery with enhanced battery from Vaultek only to experience the same issue. If I can't depend on it, it serves no purpose.

Review.Titre: I wish all of the life pod cases can…
Review.Contenu: I wish all of the life pod cases can with the lid organizer and pluck foam. Biometric option should be on all lifepods. The case itself is a good quality product and I’ll be using it and recommending it to friends and family.

Review.Titre: The biometric does not work on command…
Review.Contenu: The biometric does not work on command all the time everything else works well wasn’t for the Wi-Fi and notifications it would of been a complete waste of money what can u do
I was a little concerned on shipping.  Everything arrived as it should have.  Very Pleased with purchase.
The safe is just alright, can't decide if I will return it or not. Large and bulky, would prefer something smaller than the 2.0. Customer service is great.

Over all I really like this product. It’s light, small and compact. The only problem that I have is when my CZ 75 SP-01 is inside the safe the tray can not be in there, if it is in there I am unable to close and latch the safe. If I would have known this I most likely wouldn’t have gotten the 2.0 version and just saved the extra money and got the 1st version.

Review.Titre: Good lockbox, but the technology features need improvement
Review.Contenu: The Slider is a solid lock-box with many concealment options, however the WiFi and (most importantly), the biometric functionality is not reliable at ~%15 false-negative identification rate. Until the WiFi and biometrics have been improved, I would only recommend the basic Slider model. For this reason, I will give the Slider 3 stars (even through the basic model would probably earn a solid 5).

Update from 1star:Did not receive any help from support until I posted 1 star review.  Never received follow up support with Wi-Fi issues.  Was able to exchange for Bluetooth model which works great.  I am much happier with Bluetooth model.  Safe does not work and I didn't receive the extra pistol holders I ordered.  I have left some messages with their online support but have not heard anything from them.

Review.Titre: Received the Lifepod today and was…
Review.Contenu: Received the Lifepod today and was excited to try it out.  Programming was easy and very portable.  My only hangup is that it won't fit my Glock 19 with TLR 1S attached so I have detach the light before I store it.  That's a bit pain in the bum.  I might have to find another option and repurpose the Lifepod for document/passport travel instead.  A bit disappointing, but certainly not Vaultek's fault.

The new Vaultek NMXi has decent capacity (no way I could put 8 handguns in there though), but the biometrics are a problem. I already had a Vaultek VT Series biometric, which works flawlessly. The new one, though presumably with better technology and certainly much more expensive, has been a bit disappointing. Is there a software update that can fix these problems?:

Great product and in all fairness the Vt 10 travel safe that I have is a favorite of mine but the dissatisfaction came with the Bluetooth. One of the main features that lured me was the ability to know if any little hands had been messing with my travel safe. Unbeknownst to me the Bluetooth has at best a 10 ft connection reach. Otherwise it’s a great product and I would recommend this product for anyone who is interested in a travel safe.

I just purchased the Lifepod 2.0, and although I really want to like it i find myself being drawn to its shortfalls. For one, with my glock 19 I cannot use the storage rack. Which I find odd because this is made for compact handguns. Second would be since I cannot use the rack, my glock 19 will not stay in the pluck foam because there is too much room above it. Third is that I cannot keep any mags in the storage organizer attached to the lid if I have a firearm in the safe. Wouldnt recommend if you are using this for any handguns that are thick.

Review.Titre: The safe is top notch, but issues with fingerprint reader
Review.Contenu: The safe itself is top notch.  My only complaint is that the fingerprint reader doesn't always work on the 1st or even 2nd try.  It is quicker to just type in the 6 digit code.  I even have multiple fingerprint registered.  The fingerprint reader needs to work the 1st time every time otherwise it is a waste of a feature in my opinion since in most cases you would need to get to your weapon as quick as possible.

The ordering was extremely easy. It felt like it took forever for them to get my safe to the shipping agency, but after that delivery was fairly speedy. The safe was easy to assemble and install. The fingerprint reader is extremely sensitive, which is awesome! Overall I highly recommend Vaultek Slider series safes!

Style and design are well made and , I like the ease of it to make it your own personal case with the pluggable.  The bio finger lock does not always unlock when I place my finger on it i’m hoping it will get better

The Barikade seems to be a great little safe. It does what it promises. Unfortunately for me, the unit arrived with the top half smashed into the bottom half, which took quite a bit of force to separate. Fortunately for me it doesn't appear to have taken any damage. So for now, no harm, no foul... except for minus 1 star of course.

Review.Titre: I have three Vaultek Safe's - just one minor quibble.
Review.Contenu: I have three Vaultek Safe's, two are RS800i's - their largest units. Well designed, well built, and attractive considering they are gun safe's. My only quibble is that the internal lights, while very bright, do not stay on long enough and always turn off before I am done moving things in or out.

Review.Titre: Safe is beautiful and well built and…
Review.Contenu: Safe is beautiful and well built and customer service is very responsive and helpful as well.  The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that it will not fit a weapon with a flared mag well.  But that is just caution great product and company
Having difficulty setting up bio security for finger id...I'll continue to work on it...makes feel like I'm slow...lol

Review.Titre: This is my second safe of this type
Review.Contenu: This is my second safe of this type, but the first from Vaultek.  So far it is a much better design than my previous safe.  I like the lit keypad and the internal light.   I also like the fact that the internal battery is chargeable.   I was constantly changing out 9V batteries on my old safe.   The only "problem" I have encountered so far is that the finger print ID sensor seems to need a second scan to get the safe to open after the safe has been sitting.  It's not a huge issue for me as I do not keep my weapon stored in the safe unless I am leaving it at home.   Once home, the safe is opened again, so having that immediate opening is not a big issue.   But it could be for someone else.  Over all a good design.
Nice products. Just wish there was more options for colors and biometric locks.

The product is solid. Morgan, the customer service rep I worked with, made things right. At first I received a bent and broken safe. The lid was misaligned and wouldn’t open. Morgan got a new unit sent. Unfortunately, the new unit didn’t have biometrics, which is what I had initially ordered. I let Morgan know again and he had a new unit with the corrects specs rushed out. New unit works great, looks good, and most importantly, keeps my firearm safely stashed, but accessible in the event of an emergency.

Bluetooth connection is slow. I wouldn’t say opening it fast w your phone is a viable option. Depending on your connectivity. I don’t have the nano, so I can’t say how it’s response with connectivity is.I like it a lot. It disappears in the room. Kinda large for a clock. Small compartment. Fits compact and midsize together well. I wouldn’t put anything else in. Hinder access to either. Or one with separate light and extra magazine would work well.Seems durable and sound. Planning on getting a second one.

A little disappointed after buying the LifePod 2.0. I was pretty much required me to buy their pluck foam to keep my gun from sliding around in the safe. I’ve bought cheaper travel safes that secure my pistol with no added foam. Additionally, Vaultek’s solution to “anti-lockpicking” is to disable the ability to use your backup key. I do like the finger print option.
Decent Purchase, however, be very clear what your point and purpose of this is for ... it hold a firearm but to utilize the upper try it almost must be a micro. Otherwise...great purchase.

It's a nice safe, easy to hook up & link with biometric nano key.  Randomly the screen goes completely blank or shall i say all the "bells & whistles" disappear from the screen, then have to touch numerous places on the screen to get everything back on....

Review.Titre: The instructions to setup the safe were…
Review.Contenu: The instructions to setup the safe were not as straight forward as I would have hoped for.
This is a great safe, easy to setup and use. Easy access, quiet and smooth action when needed. Perfect for your nightstand. Five stars if it had WIFI capabilities.

Review.Titre: Product is not bad, not great for a car.
Review.Contenu: Product is not bad. It's not really made for a vehicle. The bracket seems like an afterthought and doesn't fit most modern vehicles (unless you leave the seat all the way forward). It also has a lot of rattle noise, which it won't have if mounted in a house/or office, but does when it's in a car. Vaultek doesn't include a security cable with the car mount bracket which is a huge miss. It can be removed from the car with a Philips screw driver so not real secure without a cable. Asked Vaultek about this but they were unwilling to provide the cable from the universal strap kit (which is another $35). The cable is probably $2. As usual with these setups, the fingerprint reader is hit or miss. Not sure I'd trust it in an emergency. Unfortunate that Vaultek can't sync the apps, so you have some of you wifi products in one app and any Bluetooth (like this one) on a separate app. Can't see them all in one.

Lockbox is great but I didn’t realize the side latches must be latched before locking and only unlatched after unlocking the box, which isn’t ideal since I wanted this to be a quick-access nightstand safe.  It’s briefly shown in the video on the website but it mentions in the directions in the package that not following those directions will cause malfunctions and implies that it won’t be covered by the warranty.  Still a great product and I will use it for other purposes.
The product I bought is awesome, I received it fast and it works great! I do wish it had a little more room, and there was possibly a fire rating.

Review.Titre: Safe arrived with the door hinge…
Review.Contenu: Safe arrived with the door hinge misaligned, one hit with a hammer fixed it however. Great safe, biometrics work 90% of the time but the other means of access work well
Great safe, feels solid, great for transportation. The one negative is the fingerprint reader is very sensitive. After scanning two fingers, only one works reliably.

Review.Titre: I gave this product 4 stars due to…
Review.Contenu: I gave this product 4 stars due to shipping/packaging. It was not in packaged in a way where it would remain protected when in transit. My box was kind of roughed up, like it was dropped on its edge. Thankfully, the safe was not damaged. Now the VAULTEK safe I purchased, is A1. Works as advertised and instruction were straight forward. Heavy duty too. I would have given 5 stars if it weren’t for the lacking packaging protection.

Review.Titre: I like everything about the slider safe, but
Review.Contenu: I like everything about the slider safe with wifi. So far it responds well. I train daily with the number keypad, biometric and nano biometric so that I learn muscle memory. Wifi alerts are perfect if you have little ones at home. It's a reliable quick access safe for home defense. It is the onoy quick access safe on the market that is reliable and have wifi features that work very well. There is only one complaint,  I wish there was a heavier duty version. I feel like I can open it with basic tools like a screwdriver. The safe attaches to base with 4 small hooks, I can probably use large screwdriver to pry safe from base. Reason for 4 stars, otherwise exceptional safe. Vaultek can keep the current version but have an option to purchase a more robust safe. I'd be willing to pay twice for a more solid safe, just to prevent theft of my firearm when I'm not home. For now when I'm out of town I take out firearm from slider and place it in my large safe.

My first vault arrived damaged but anew one was quickly dispatched to me with a return label for the damaged item.The vault is well made.  The biometric panel is a bit iffy, not always working on the first try.  The keypad is fine.  I wish there were a few more numbers available but okay otherwise.  Programming could be easier.All in all a good item at a fair price.

Review.Titre: Great safe with a lot of features
Review.Contenu: Great safe with a lot of features.  So many ways to configure the inside makes it very flexible.  Two things I would like to see improved are the finger print scanner seems to be a little finicky and I would not rely on in an emergency access situation.  The other would be a heavier gauge metal version, maybe 10 gauge as an option.  Otherwise very satisfied with my purchase of the 800i

My first Lifepod and Vaultek product. This is a great portable option to secure and transport my firearm. Love the tactical bag too. Happy to see upgrade security to disable program button identified on the original. My only negative I would like addressed is the USB power backup is micro, it's 2022 everything is going Type C. Just minor inconvenience to carry another power cord.

Review.Titre: I actually really like this safe, but……
Review.Contenu: I actually really like this safe. It looks great and I really like the attachments. There’s one absolutely ridiculous thing though, the little tabs that cover the wall mount holes on back of safe that are accessed from the inside have lock tight on the screws. These screws are tiny and strip out easily. I stripped 2 different ones. It pretty ridiculous the these need lock tight. Basically I need to drill out these screws now to mount to wall.

I was able to get a handle for my life pod.  I almost gave a five star rating.  I wish there was a way to leave the handle on the container and still secure the lifepod with the cable.  The other issue is that the part was $9.99 which I feel is a reasonable price, however, the shipping and handling for the part is almost the same amount.

The new DS2i Smart Safe is nearly perfect for what I need. Pros: - Perfect size for my bedside table and my home-defense sidearm (P320 M17). - Dimmable clock, temp, and humidity display. - Tamper alarm so I know when someone's been trying to open it while I'm not home.- 4-Digit numeric combination, fingerprint scanner with more than 20 programmable prints, reliable app, and backup keys.Cons:- Storing the Sig Sauer P320 M17 with two 21 round magazines adds quite a bit of weight to the tray. Therefore, when the safe is unlocked and the tray slides out, it's significantly slower than when it is empty.

Great safe. For my setup the provided micro usb cable used to charge the safe was too short and had to get a replacement which ended up being a 90 degrees and reversible micro usb cable. I purchased the non absorbent foam as an upgrade to replace the original only to realize they are the same thing and not an upgrade which I believe should be stated under the description. The setup was pretty straight forward and I like the fact that I get an instant notification when the safe is in use or being tampered with.

Review.Titre: I have purchased five Vaultek products…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased five Vaultek products over time, and keep coming back for the utility and quality of their lineup.  My last acquisition was a extra shelf for one of my MXE Series safes.  Only time things weren't perfect,  when a rail refused to seat in its retaining clip. Brute force was a failure. Finally resorted to removing the rail receptor, placing it on the clip and then reattaching it to the rail.  That worked! Only would have deducted a half star for this, but that was not an option.  Overall, this is a five star company!!

Review.Titre: Overall good build quality but needs…
Review.Contenu: Overall good build quality but needs the ability to leave the backlight for the keypad and numbers on all the time. In the middle of the night you cannot see anything and any mispressed button faults out. Not sure if this can be added in via some update or not. Otherwise works nicely.

Review.Titre: I love the safe interior and exterior…
Review.Contenu: I love the safe interior and exterior really out if words for this safe .... the only thing I wish was that it was more room can't close the door with a rifle on the door if the shelves are in because my rifle hit the selves.... if it was wider and deep I'll be give it 1000 stars lol

I’ve had the barikade for about two years now and I really like and trust it but it malfunctioned recently after a few emails back-and-forth and a confirmation of my receipt they are sending me a replacement. I also own a life pod 2.0 and I also really like and trust that safe. Customer service experience was very pleasant.

Review.Titre: There’s a lot to like about this safe
Review.Contenu: There’s a lot to like about this safe. Sleek, useful digital display, QI charger for smartphones, numerical and fingerprint lock, decent size for a pistol and magazines. I would love to see VAULTEK improve by adding to the number keys with a full 0-9 keypad. Also, for this price point the fingerprint reader is not up to par. Research how the smartphones do it and incorporate that. It’s too slow, too error prone.I’m overall happy with it for my needs though.

So far, I’m pleased with my new DS2i Smart Station.  Programming the Administrator fingerprints was confounding.  The written instructions in the packaging and online were less than clear.  The instructional video was much better. I still have not been able to register my product.  I already have a Vaultek account but it doesn’t recognize my password,  So.  I tried the forgotten password link and get the message that the password reset code is invalid or was previously used.  Try it again and the system requires me to wait an hour due to too many attempts.  As best I can tell, you get 2 tries and the system locks down.  I’ll try calling during business hours.  Fingers crossed!

Replaced a Lifepod 2.0 with a DS2i Smart Station and while mostly happy with it, after waiting a few months for it to become available, disappointed the available space therein wasn't such that I could fit the same amount of contents: also didn't like the lack of clearance at the back of the drawer.  For the money, I expected more.

Review.Titre: Overall purchase process was easy but
Review.Contenu: Overall purchase process was easy. Item arrived in time. The finger print sensor on the product is not very reliable from what I have experienced in the past few weeks. Takes multiple attempts with a single finger which could be precious time lost in an emergency.

I ordered a Lifepod 2.0 and it arrived well packaged and undamaged.  The product looks great and seems to be high quality in terms of manufacture, fit, and function.  So far I'm happy with my purchase.Two things keep me from rating it 5 stars.  One is the pre-perforated pluck foam makes it difficult to get a fit fine-tuned beyond the perforations (a good, functional fit can still be made).  Secondly, the depth does not allow for use of the tray along many common sized carry pistols; it would take a very thin pistol in order to use both together.  For my taste a small design change to allow full use of all features simultaneously would be a great improvement.

A little thinner than expected. It’s hard to fit a handgun with the tray inside the safe, they don’t quite fit together, but safe works great backpack fits a lot more than expected inside of it and backpack looks great. Wish I would’ve ordered the one with biometrics/fingerprint reader. Overall great product.

Review.Titre: I recently purchased Lifepod 2.0 and I…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased Lifepod 2.0 and I am so happy with my decision. The quality is outstanding, and it has exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend this product to anyone in the market for a portable safe. However, when using the available top tray, it doesn't sit flush due to the width of my Walther CCP grip.

Review.Titre: Nice safe that can be visible
Review.Contenu: Nice safe that can be visible, yet discrete. The drawer opens smooth, interior light is nice. Easy to set up. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars, is because the fingerprint reader doesn’t always work.

I purchased a Vaultek Slider for my home.  The concept is great but it really needs to be a little deeper front to back considering it's advertised to fit a full-sized handgun with an optic (Red dot).  I use it for a full size Sig Sauer P320 but I had to change the grip module from a full size to a compact in order to clear the optic (sig sauer romeo 1 pro). Even with the compact grip mode it just barely clears when removing the gun.  Fortunately the Sig P320 series are modular but most customers won't have that option unless they have a Sig Sauer.  The cost is a bit high considering the overall size and gauge of steel they use as well.  I'd really like to buy their Smart Station but the cost for that is REALLY extreme for what it is and I have seen any discounts/sales etc even though I've already bought one of their products.

Bought a refurbished Lifepod 2.0 and couldn't be happier! The box it came in was the only thing that looked used otherwise it could have passed for brand new. Came with all the OG parts. Would recommend it to anyone.

Review.Titre: The size limitations for this type of safe.
Review.Contenu: My Vaultek safe filled my specific storage need perfectly.  The only critique would be to increase the hight of the RS800i by four inches to better accommodate two shelves.

Review.Titre: Great safe, 1 con is the Fingerprint feature is not accurate
Review.Contenu: This a great safe (series 20). Secured to 1 location,quick access and safe from unwated prying. But the only downside is the fingerprint option is not accurate. It defeats the purpose of a fingerprint feature if will not work everytime.

Review.Titre: Very good product, lived up to expectations
Review.Contenu: So far the product has met my expectations. In my case the fact that all actions like opening or tampering attempts trigger an instant push notification or email is the most valuable feature. Contruction is good  and materials are high quality. Customer service seems to be good as they followed up with me all the way after shipping to see if everything was Ok. The reason for 4 stars has to do with the Wi-Fi setup. In my case I had to go with an alternate setup method that surprisingly wasn't described in the instructions despite the many manuals came with it. However, I hope that these little details get improved in subsequent updates and versions of the software. Other than that I am very happy with the product.

Vaultek makes a great product. I own 3 different Vaultek safes.  The shipping boxes that are used do not protect the product very well from damage.  The lifepod 2.0 is packaged with plastic corners that the safe box packaging sits in inside the exterior box.  I received the box with the lifepod 2.0 not sitting in these plastic corners so it was loose inside the box.  The exterior box was damaged with a good size hole which in turn damaged the interior boxes clear see through plastic for viewing that the lifepod 2.0 comes in which in turn put a small scratch in the top of the lifepod 2.0 itself.

Review.Titre: please list what kind of locks and keys they have
Review.Contenu: There's one thing I wanted to know before purchasing: what kind of lock core does the Barrikade have? And I did some assuming and thought it was disc detainer. Had I known it wasn't disc detainer I would have upgraded. As it is I can fill in the keyway if I think it's a major liability since it can be powered externally.Other than that: great little box! Fits what I don't want grabbed ezpz.

I had to return my humidor twice. Once because it was too big and the second time because of discoloration. Both times the refund has been prompt and follow up service has been exceptional! Right now my unit is seasoning and I can't wait to make my Dad jealous when I go yo his new house this Saturday for a stick!!!

The quality of the materials and workmanship is high.  The look and feel gives credence to the reputation that Vaultek Safe is a top notch product.  The handgun and important documents fit nicely and are so secure.  The product arrived promptly after ordering and was well packaged.  Great product.

Review.Titre: I've been using the she for about 2…
Review.Contenu: I've been using the she for about 2 weeks now. Carry it everyday to and from work. My primary goal is to keep my kiddos from gaining access to the firearm and for that the lifepod 2.0 send wonderful.  Some annoying aspects of the lifepod are things like the latches are not smooth at all and I often find myself fighting with them for a few moments. The removable tray I find problematic as well, it does not fit with my pistol (glock 19). My last gripe is the battery. 9v are not a common battery around my house so it's annoying, I'd much prefer a rechargeable battery since it already has a charging port built in. Overall, I like the lifepod 2.0, it has some minor inconveniences for my personal use. I'd recommend it to anyone in the market for something travel friendly and wanting to keep kids away from the firearm.

I was originally frustrated that it took so long to ship (about a month).  However, once this arrived, my husband absolutely LOVES it.  So 5 stars for the product and deducting 1 star for charging my credit card then shipping 3+ weeks later.

Review.Titre: Seems to be a good safe
Review.Contenu: It was well packaged from the factory. They provide easy to understand instructions and manual. It was relatively easy to set up(I.e. fingerprints, PIN etc.) but I couldn’t get the Wi-Fi function to work but that may have been a good thing—one less device connected via Wi-Fi, can’t get hacked while online.It doesn’t have the most storage space but then again it’s designed for smaller spaces which works for me.

Review.Titre: For sure the best in its class…
Review.Contenu: For sure the best in its class currently on the market. Like everything there is always room for improvement.  A bigger spring on the drawer may be needed at some point in the future with two full-size guns, the drawer is slow to open.
The security of the product is good. I couldn’t give it a 5 star because the biometric programming is difficult to set. After numerous attempts, I just gave up. Will try again at another time.

The safe itself is great, easy to setup with the guide included. Just note the wireless charger can be finicky especially if you use a more durable phone case but it still works just have to get the right spot.

Review.Titre: Nice piece of gear, but carry handle seems not well thought out
Review.Contenu: Nice piece of gear, but if I had known that the security cable and the carry handle cannot be used at the same time I would not have ordered the carry handle. Maybe make that part more clear or set expectations better there. Thank you for considering.

The product is as advertised!  Smaller than I expected which is good.  That said, I would like to be able to fit a pistol and the tray in at the same time.  I’ll need to purchase the lid organizer.  I communicates with the Vaultek team that the packaging was very bad. It was a simple plastic bag that was ripped open in the FedEx truck and had liquid soap all over it. They responded kindly and apologetically.  If it weren’t for the shipping, they would get 5 stars.
Great product to start. Sturdy and functional. Delivery and set up was easy. The fingerprint screen does not always function correctly. Only downfall.

Review.Titre: Great product for the techie gun owner
Review.Contenu: I purchased the WiFi connected VTi model. It feels like a high quality product, and setup was quite smooth. There are several issues which could make this product better. First and foremost, the charging port: vaultek didn't get the memo that micro USB is dead. It's time to move to USB C. Second, the internal light turns off pretty quickly after opening, even if the device is connected to power. It would be great if there was an option in the app to change the timeout, or keep the light on for as long as the box is open. Third, fingerprint management in the app could be better if you were allowed to delete individual prints and to reprogram them. If I have two people with access and then I want to remove one of them, it seems that I have to delete ALL of the prints and start over. Fourth, it would be nice if you could adjust how far the door opens, and if it would go further to allow comfortable access with vertical mounting on a wall. I'm looking forward to the next generation of this product, as well as others.

Ordering and receipt of products was fine, but there is no option to select shipping other than ground for more immediate delivery. Obviously this is only for items small or light-enough to travel by air.

Review.Titre: The safe was exactly what I was looking…
Review.Contenu: The safe was exactly what I was looking for but the checkout process was a bit of a headache. I tried with 2 different credit cards and it kept giving me a message saying it was fraud. I finally had to use my debit card for the purchase to go through.

Love the look and ease of use (mostly). Vaultek does a great job of sending out info with the safe to ensure ease of setup from the get go. I think it was definitely a purchase of convenience at the price point rather than a value, but overall I’m satisfied with my purchase thus far.

Review.Titre: This is a great product for traveling…
Review.Contenu: This is a great product for traveling when you wish to secure items other then a firearm.  My only issue is that almost every time you pick it up you touch the lock key and it "turns on" for the code input.

AS a Deputy Marshal, State and Federal Firearms Instructor, and Business Owner I found the Products well made. I Try to push new owners to secure any firearms that aren't on their bodies from the access of children, including 40 year old children. The order was incorrect in regard to colors ordered and such, but otherwise packed securely, and arrived intact.

It's a good safe with one pretty big flaw. There should be an option to have a dim, always-on light around the finger pad so you can find it in the dark. This seems so obvious perhaps I'm missing how to activate it?

This is a wonderful product. Very well secure and durable design. I do wish it had a duel lock mechanism instead of one In the center. Makes me feel more secured that the device is harder to break into or pry apart. Other then that I do love this safe. It makes me more comfortable around my home woth family.

Bought the biometric slider for a desk mount.  Great packaging.  Instructions were easy to follow.  Installation was simple.  Programming steps were pretty easy to follow.  Fingerprint reader most times takes two tries.  Although it looks like it will fit a SIG P320C with an optic, the depth doesn't allow you to draw the weapon cleanly out; you have to twist it to clear the optic from the case.  Another inch opening extension would solve this.  Stores the magazine without issue.  The slider mechanism is far from silent.  An audible lock release "click" is very noticeable and the drawer extension, although smooth, is noisy.  Overall, I'm pleased with the safe in terms of convenience and security, but the design could use some improvement.

The safe is really good and easy to use. My order got fulfilled quickly and to me just as fast. My only nitpick is that the hardware supplied is to mount to walls and much to big to mount to most of my furniture without busting through the otherside.
Great safe, second safe but different model from Vaultek. Packaging for shipment should be better. The safe arrived damaged and needed to be replaced. Replacement was smooth.
Fully satisfied with all three of my products.
Functional design. Build quality is awesome, only issue is phone charger on top is hard to find in the dark. And seems to beep at random times of the night. Would definitely buy it again.

Quality product. Easy setup. Still figuring out a few things. Would’ve given 5 stars but Bluetooth connection has been not great even when standing right next to it.. and trying to figure out why it beeps every 10 minutes when my phone is charging on it🤷🏼‍♂️

Review.Titre: The Vaultek Smartstation DS2i was worth the wait
Review.Contenu: The Vaultek Smartstation DS2i is an excellent product but the only problem was that it was tough to order the safe on their website. Once the product was released the website started to crash. This was the 2nd time I tried to buy their safe when they released the email stating that it was back in stock. This was the only reason I gave 4/5 stars. I intend to buy more Vaultek products.

Review.Titre: The only reason I gave it a 4 star is…
Review.Contenu: The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because they make the shipping label and then not ship it for a few days. Also spending almost 300 bucks on 2 safes I still had to pay for the shipping. Other than that, they are fantastic.
Accurate in-stock notifications, received item in around 6 days from date of purchase.Only had it for one week, so far works as advertised.

Review.Titre: Slight confusion but we got there
Review.Contenu: I intended to purchase a VT10 safe and after reading the description, it appeared I would need to also purchase a mounting device and an upgraded foam insert. The site wasn’t working properly (showed no inventory) so I called in. A very nice rep confirmed they had the items in stock and placed my order for me. When the safe arrived, it already had the foam insert. That wasn’t how it was listed on the site (I had to purchase to upgrade) but I was happy with it. So, I went through the return process (nice reps) which is easy enough; however the cost to ship the extra item back is more than 1/2 the price itself. Regardless I sent it back. Oh well. The site seems to be the issue (lack of detail on what’s included resulting an an unnecessary purchase) and incorrectly listing out of stock items when inventory was existing. All system stuff that can be cleaned up. In the end, it’s a great product and they have great reps working for them. I’d recommend this VT10 to anyone.

Excellent lifepod 2.0 product the only thing I don't like is the depth it should be more depth to it for big guns like for a full size hand gun. When I put my G34 an put the tray on top it won't fully close. Leaving a 3 centimeter gap open.

I have not had the safe for more than 3 weeks so I feel I cannot give it an honest review. The design is good, slide is quiet but not super silent. It definitely gives our family a piece of mind and easy access to the weapon in case it is needed
Would be nice if it had a clock alarm built in so you can use it to wake up since it’s most likely going to be at a bedside. It has Bluetooth so maybe connect it to the phone charging on top somehow?

Review.Titre: The quality of the product is great
Review.Contenu: The quality of the product is great.  Only having some issue with the biometric reader keeping the fingerprints in memory after they are programmed in.

So I bought the Vaultek Lifepod biometric safe. $260It's annoying I had to buy separately the carry handle.That being said it's a good safe. But I would love to see how securing the cable holds up. The case is plastic and the cable connects into a small piece of plastic. I don't think it's reinforced but I could be wrong. But I feel like with a good hard yank the cable could cut easily be ripped out of the plastic. I will not try it because it's so expensive and I don't want to break it but I'm curious if people have done it on YouTube.

Would recommend to anyone, but tell them to get it while on sale. This is my first handgun safe.         I got the vt series, wifi.+     feels strong, heavy, secure, great features, looks great,  App is....ok,  requiring administrative fingerprints to save more fingerprints, tamper & drop sounds alert, fits an m18 with a red dot from sig with a 17rd mag inserted plus 23rd mags, directions for setup were spot on easy-     expensive, charge light is bright especially at night while sleeping, app is in need of an upgrade, sluggish app, need the option to disable charge light, package was shipped and wish it was more discreet, I don't get push notification but rather emails(perhaps i need to look into it more). More charging locations would be ideal instead of the one on the ONE side or have the charge port on the bottom and make it so the cord can go all directions, doesn't fit iwb or owb holsters unless you take out the foam   Yes, the charge light DRIVES ME CRAZY, although i did find a solution!!!! I used permanent marker to diffuse the NIGHT LIGHT.     So the makers don't realize this is going on the night stand by the bed?!?! 4.885 / 5 stars because of the charging indicator light and the price. I paid $450 and would have felt better at $300 or less. LOL great product though 👌

Review.Titre: Not as much room as I'd hoped...
Review.Contenu: I'm not a big fan of off-body carry because if someone grabs the bag or pack where your weapon is, you are now unarmed and the bad guys get a gun. So I bought this so that in those rare cases I don't want the gun on me, I can be confident that it is secure if it gets taken. On the plus side, it was easy enough to set up, although it doesn't come with a 9v battery, and lets face it--who uses those anymore? So you probably won't have one lying around. It is well constructed and the locking mechanism works well. The big downside that I have with it is the room. Yes, it will hold a full sized firearm, which is great. However, if you have a gun in this thing, you can forget about using the tray, it simply isn't deep enough. So yeah, that is a big downer for me, because it limits the amount of things you can carry. So it may not be a five star for me, but you may not care a bit. I did buy the lid ordanizer--extra cost, so that helps a little bit.
Great product. Just wished they all worked on the same app.

Looks great, easy to operate - just one issue, random times when you place your phone on top to charge the time showing on front display just disappears and you have to go into your phone app to fix it ??

Good quality safe, very quiet, fast release. Very easy to setup. Cons: the clock will disappear occasionally and I have to tap the screen to get it to appear again, the phone has to be exactly on the charging circle in order to charge. You can’t just place your phone on the top and expect it to charge. The charge is also very slow, it is an over night charge defiantly not a lightning charge. Last and most importantly make sure to pay close attention to the clearance. I have a magwell on the base of my gun and when I put that gun in the safe it rubbed against the top of the safe and the safe would not open at all, so I had to keep a different gun in the safe. The height of my magwell is 1 3/4 inches.

Review.Titre: Life pod xt SPECIAL ED. I THOUGHT IT WOULDT SCRATCH
Review.Contenu: Well I just bought the special edition. And I took it trough security at Atlanta airport and I thought this case would held up rough handling, but I was surprised to se see a scratch on the top as it came out from the security filters. So I don’t know if I would throw it like they do on the advertisement video. I don’t want to ruin my 700 box, so in that aspect I would give a bad score. For all other aspects I love my case. Is so fancy. Everyone at my gun range just went dropping jaws all the way. I bought extra accessories and I really love that I can arrange things how ever I need to. For example if going to the range or just to keep my guns safe at home. So I don’t know if it will resist a fall and I defenetly won’t try to see if it handles ok and won’t brake.  Also I think the pressure latches fills a little weak (cheap material). Maybe I am wrong but time will tell. It’s my first vaultek product and so far I am very happy with my life pod xt. I hope this will help other customers to decide because it is defenetly NOT CHEAP.

Safe is really nice, and exactly as advertised. However, the size and space inside the safe are deceiving and fill up quick. Had I known what I know now, I would have went up a size. Other than that, great product!

Amazing product. Easy to use. I love the biometric, keypad and key options! Looks tough and sleek. Seems durable. Had no issues traveling and flying with it. I just wish it was a tad deeper to fit my G19 and use the tray 🙁 without almost having to sit on it to close it.

Review.Titre: Returning the item was a hassle but…
Review.Contenu: Returning the item was a hassle but customer service was great!!

Review.Titre: A long wait for the product
Review.Contenu: A long wait for the product. Once back in stock there was a rapid turnaround from order to delivery. Very satisfied with the products construction and ease of set-up

Review.Titre: RS Series - Spring Loaded AR Mount
Review.Contenu: The mount works well, it's just very finicky about placement to get everything to fit. It would probably work better with a shorter barrel AR.

Review.Titre: Does not fit pistols with red dots…
Review.Contenu: Does not fit pistols with red dots unless you remove the tray. Finger print scanner is not consistent unfortunately.

It’s nice overall. But I expected a tad more for the money. Like the wireless charger doesn’t work all the time. It just beeps constantly unless I get lucky to get it in the exact correct spot. I have an iPhone 13. So it should work. I do have a thinner MagSafe case so it shouldn’t impede it. Also the drawer opens 3/4 or the way. I have to pull it all the way open. I can still access my G17 though. Minor issues. But I wish it was just a little better

Love the Smart Vault. It took a long time to get one because they were out of stock. I still was not able to order the mounting self because it was out of stock. Also I had to try several times to get checked out when I did get this one, I think their system was overloaded.

Great product. Absolutely love it.  Only complaint is the foam that came with it was not up to par. Firearm would bounce around in the case and had to purchase the foam, handle package after the fact.  Also.  It would be awesome if the bag was slightly bigger to allow room for laptop etc.

Review.Titre: I like the device works very well
Review.Contenu: I like the device works very well. The only issue I have is that you guys are out of stock for the mounting plate to mount it to a flat surface. The cables great but you can cut the cable, so I’m hoping that you guys are gonna get the flat mount plate in one of these days.

Review.Titre: I order this item under the impression…
Review.Contenu: Even though there were problems with delayed shipping due to technical issues, but the customer service team followed up with me and the product is very amazing!

Review.Titre: Company itself is great it is more…
Review.Contenu: Company itself is great it is more about the product. The fingerprint scanner is not the best it works maybe 1 out of 3 times and only works on your thumb.

The LifePod 2.0 is a very well-made pistol safe - good for one full-size or two sub-compact firearms. It’s not as indestructible as a built in gun-safe, but realistically, you couldn’t lift anything that was as tough as a bank vault. This will keep kids, those with prying eyes, and random thrives away from what you’re carrying, but give you instant access.

I’ve had my RS800i safe for just over a year now and it’s been rock solid. Recently, it developed an issue (WiFi drops and screen blinking), and I reached out to their support team and got a prompt response. It was determined that I needed a new internal backup battery, which they promptly mailed to me for free. The new battery fixed my issues, and I’m back to having a solid, reliable gun safe. It’s good to know that companies like Vaultek still know the art of customer service. Thanks Vaultek!

I bought this second Vaultek Lifepod for travel after trying my wife’s “Rose Sig Sauer P365” edition Vaultek Lifepod.  Simple, relatively light (about 2 pounds), and pretty easy to program and operate.  There is a key backup.  United Airlines gave me a hard time when I last traveled with a padlocked plastic case which the gate agent pried open and poked his little finger in telling me I needed to find a better locked box - the Lifepod can’t be easily pried open and is TSA compliant.  It fits my Glock 43X MOS pistol with Holosun sight mounted and an extra magazine.  I would recommend this safe to any of my friends that carry compact firearms concealed and are looking for a travel safe for their luggage or car and also as a safe that easily fits in a nightstand drawer.  I chose orange because it definitely stands out in a suitcase full of stuff.

Review.Titre: I have a life pod 2.0 humidor
Review.Contenu: I have a life pod 2.0 humidor. The biometric scanner stoped working on me. This high quality product also comes with high quality warranty and customer service that is as easy as a email. They gave me some suggestions to fix the problem. When those didn’t work they were quick to respond and help me get a replacement. Really good product!!

Review.Titre: Each Vaultek can have a specific use!
Review.Contenu: I own quite a few Vaultek Safes and they sure do NOT disappoint! AMAZING safes, fastest bio-to-open I've seen or used. The RS 500i is perfect near my bed to access (God forbid) in the middle of the night; I use the LifePod 2.0 for travel on airplanes; I have a 20 series attached to the front seat in my car; I also own a VT, 10 Series, LifePod, LifePodXT, and I just ordered a Smart Station!!! (I almost have their whole lineup!) I still have a MX on my wish list for my office! (<--Some day!) These safes are literally the best of the BEST, and as I described above, each safe can have specific uses! I will say, having the LifePod 2.0 for use to travel with my firearm is really one of the best ways to do that; so light weight, and I attach it to the inside of my suitcase (wrapped the cable around the poles in the back of the suitcase). Such a GREAT company...
First vaultek safe and totally worth every penny. I use the lifepod 2.0 for my bedside with the fingerprint scanner. Absolutely quick and easy access and setup. Will be getting the larger safes soon!

Whatever your needs are, they have a safe that works.  Paired with biometrics and wifi/bluetooth, they are the one stop complete solution.  I own several and will buy more.  Hopefully the next one will be an upright rifle safe.  Great job guys!
Fast shipping, sleek looking product (Barrikade series 2), biometrics works great. Would buy from again.

Review.Titre: Great selection of choices for all of…
Review.Contenu: Great selection of choices for all of my firearm needs. Very well made and thoughtful design. This is my second purchase and would highly recommend their products. Very solid build, lighted interior and textured outer shell. no reservations at all.

While the unit is rather expensive, its nicely crafted, flexible and useful.Used on a night stand, its three-way function as a pistol safe, clock and iPhone charger is convenient. Added are the multiple forms of entry either biometric or numeric keypad.Add the available phone App and it makes this safe a useful purchase.

Review.Titre: Great product and great customer service!
Review.Contenu: What a nice functional product! Our unit stopped working a short time after purchasing it. I can't believe how quickly Grace and the Vaultek team responded and addressed the problem! In this day of experiencing some poor or no customer service, it is refreshing to know that this company stands behind its products and provides great customer service!
My VAULTEK smart safe works exactly as advertised. It was Just what I was looking for. Will be purchasing another one very soon

Hello,I was very pleased on how Vaultek expedited my order. From order to delivery it took only two days to receive my gun case. The delivery was flawless, and the content was perfect.During my travels, the Airlines were very impressed on the Quality, Materials, and Security features used on this gun case.Thank You,Miguel Jordan

Review.Titre: Excellent safes, easy to use, good value, fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Excellent products (I've now bought 2 safes, and several accessories), well made, good value, and delivered swiftly in excellent packaging. Easy to set up, and very effective.
Awesome customer service, when a package arrived with a missing piece, they sent it out right away. The total time on the phone with them was less than two minutes, no runaround. Thank you so much!
Black Friday discount.  Good pricing. Good product. Fast shipping.

I purchased three Vaultek products this year.  First two were everything I expected.  The third had a problem.  I sent Vaultek an email late Friday night and heard back Sunday.  They took care of the problem immediately and shipped a new safe to me.  After setup, I returned the problem safe.  Vaultek did everything I could ask.
Awesome accessories like always.  My safes are super almost as impressive as the contents of them.  Love vaultek and everyone always thinks they are awesome when I show them off.

I contacted customer support to get a replacement part. I found out the item was not originally included with the item I purchased. Customer service responded quickly to my request and offered to send me the item at no charge.  I was very surprised and will definitely continue to buy the safes from this company. Couldn't be happier with the service.
All star gun case, many compliments on the design and integrity.

Awesome safe! Battery life is great and the case itself is pretty strong. My only complaint is even with the app theres no way to see if the safe has been tampered with unless on the same wifi, which kind of defeats the purpose. However, solid product!

The safe arrived sooner than expected. It was easy to install and set up. It is very customizable with the purchase of handgun/rifle storage options. The biometric operation is flawless as is the numeric keypad.
Quick shipping and quality safes, all around good experience

Review.Titre: My first impressions of the Vaultek DS2i
Review.Contenu: At first I was cautious at pulling the trigger on this safe because of the price as it was my first hand gun safe so I only had online pictures and reviews to go by. I am so glad I went for it! When it arrived I immediately felt reassured of the quality just by the weight of the box. The packaging was well done protecting the contents from any shipping damage that could have been done. The safe is truly a work of art and craftmanship. From the elegant, useful front display, to the top mounted fingerprint reader and 4 digit code input pad and wireless charging pad (for phones and smart watches), to the USB charging port on the rear, a lot of thought was put into this safe other than just storing your firearm safely and other important items. The steel construction is solid and sturdy. The user manuals are informative and very thorough. Upon unlocking the safe the drawer slides out quickly and smoothly. The padded interior provides protection for your gun and any valuables. The interior light is just bright enough to do the job. Pushing the drawer back in gives a nice satisfying locking click telling you that everything is secure. Mine is holding a fully loaded 1911 with a loaded spare mag and my EDC knife - a decent amount of weight - yet the drawer still operates like butter. The finger print reader works 99% of the time for me first time. I've gotten to know the exact angle to come down on the reader where it works best. My 4 digit code always works no matter how fast I press it. I also purchased the desktop locking surface mount which I will be installing along with the cable lock as well. I will defiantly be buying a second one to house my S&W .40 plus mags. The clock and phone charger will be a nice addition to my night stand!

Review.Titre: Vaultek VTi storage for two guns…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Vaultek VTi because the interior dimensions allow storage for two handguns. My Glock model 45 and Walther PDP easily store inside with their magazines. Full size models fit too, as the Glock 17 and Beretta have extra room. The VTi has both number code and biometric entry, which open instantly. It's perfect for home storage. Although at 16 pounds I probably won't use it in the car for gun transport to the range. I ordered the safe online from Vaultek and delivery was 4 days later. I feel I purchased the best product available for safe gun storage.

Review.Titre: Not only is the product excellent…
Review.Contenu: Not only is the product excellent, but I had the unfortunate luck of having the delivered safe stolen from the front of my building in NYC.  After calling and explaining the situation. The Vaultek team totally stepped up and worked with the parcel service and myself to resolve the matter and sent me another safe.  Great product and even greater customer service. Already bought a second safe for the lake house! You guys rock! I’m a customer for life! Thank you.
The price was great,shipping was fast and amazing.overall a great product
The simplicity of setting up the security code and security the safe provides.
Great product, even refurbished product was like buy new, should of boughten one long time ago…
Great Unit!  Serves the exact purpose I need it for without the concern for little ones or unwanted guests getting their hands on the contents.

You now have a loyal customer for life! I shipped you my 7-year old safe that would no longer hold a charge for repairs. And you guys were so generous and sent me a refurbished one that looks absolutely brand new! Thank you so very much and God bless! 😃

Review.Titre: I saw videos on YouTube about how this…
Review.Contenu: I saw videos on YouTube about how this brand of safes compared to others and decided to buy right after.The customer service is excellent and quick to respond. I'll recommend this brand to anyone looking for a great weapons safe company.

Review.Titre: I believe in buying nothing but the best, cry once buy one
Review.Contenu: I believe in buying nothing but the best!!! I own 4 Vaultex products. I plan on buying a few more. My philosophy is " cry once, buy once!!! If you can't afford what you want from Vaultex.  Save up or sell something!!! LOL
Very well designed and built. Functions exactly as advertised. The WIFI and features make this the best safe out there!

Review.Titre: I have purchased 2 safes from Vaultek…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased 2 safes from Vaultek and have been extremely pleased with the function and quality of the product. When I did run into a minor issue with the product, their customer service team responded quickly and I feel went above and beyond to help me out. Will purchase from them again.

Review.Titre: I recently had an issue with a safe…
Review.Contenu: I recently had an issue with a safe that my wife had gifted me, as its electronics had failed. But when I contacted Vaultek, the company that manufactured the safe, they promptly replaced it with a new one within a week. I really appreciate the quick and efficient service provided by Vaultek and will definitely continue to buy their safes in the future. Thank you very much, Vaultek!

Review.Titre: The lifepod 1.0 is just what I wanted…
Review.Contenu: The lifepod 1.0 is just what I wanted plus the added pluck foam is a perfect fit for my Beretta PX4 full. With one magazine in the well and one to keep it company. Snug as a bug. If I really wanted to set up the pluck foam another way one could get a 3rd magazine to squeeze in. Overall very please with this purchase from Vaultek and shipping was delivered sooner than expected. 👍

Second Vaultek safe (first one is amazing) came a bit less than perfect. Customer service was EXCELLENT! Sent me a replacement next day , responded right away. Highly recommend . Great products and great service

Review.Titre: Vaultek Lifepod XR Range Edition Safe - Outstanding!
Review.Contenu: Before my purchase, although the website was very detailed, I had several questions about the product (mainly accessories that would match the safe I wanted to purchase). Support provided the info I requested promptly. The order process was straightforward and easy. Shipment came when promised. When my Lifepod XR Range Edition arrived, I couldn't have been happier with my purchase. The safe was easy to setup and program. The XR has a very functional design and perfect for my needs (ordered extra XT/XR pistol rack to swap out the provided mag rack to carry an extra pistol when needed). Along with the safe, I bought a spare security cable for my car and use this to secure the Lifepod XR every time I travel to the range. The provided security cable is used within the house. Overall, a great ordering experience and outstanding product. This is my second Lifepod (Lifepod 2.0) and my wife has a Lifepod 1.0 on the way. I would recommend these products highly.
This is my 2nd Vaultek within a few yrs. Appreciate the quality & craftsmanship of the products.

Review.Titre: Shocked By How Good Vaultek's Customer Service Is!!
Review.Contenu: Absolutely blown away by the excellent customer service at Vaultek! I recently purchased one of the Vaultek Smart Stations and was having an issue with the charger. Customer service got back to me IMMEDIATELY to troubleshoot the issue, and offered a replacement to solve the problem. So good to see that customers still matter to good companies like Vaultek!!
Vaultek is great! I took a misstep with the organizer, good product just not for me. The safes and the organization modules for my guns and magazines are awesome! Easy website. Would recommend.

I ordered the Slider safe for under my desk at my office and the product is excellent.  It opens fast and presents the weapon perfectly for an emergency situation.  After about 5 years of use I had a battery issue.  The customer service is even better than the product (which is hard to believe).  Grace promptly answered my emails and after some trouble shooting resolved my issue.  Amazing product and even better customer service!

Review.Titre: This is an outstanding modern product
Review.Contenu: This is an outstanding modern product. My main concern was safety and children. I don’t care about a fire or theft and wasn’t interested in a 300 pound huge box. This met all those requirements. Mine is bolted to studs in 3 places and connected to electricity constantly.
Very nice product, easy ordering and prompt delivery.
Easy to order, quick delivery, great product!
I'm on my 3rd Vaultek safe and they make a great product.  I've had to contact support twice for questions, and each time they responded quickly with helpful answers.

Review.Titre: Some of the best customer service I’ve…
Review.Contenu: Some of the best customer service I’ve experienced in a while. I own three of their safes. One of the safes, the charge port stopped working and wouldn’t take charge after being installed for over a year. I called, left a message, received a phone call back within 5 minutes, had me email her the safe information, and later that day I was notified that they would be sending me a brand new updated version. Couldn’t be happier. Thank you to Grace at Vaultek.
Vaultek offers great products at a reasonable price and have amazing customer service.  They made everything easy and took good care of me.

Review.Titre: The product was as good as expected…
Review.Contenu: The product was as good as expected because I had purchased from them before. But what I didn’t know was how outstanding their customer service was. FedEx lost my package. I reached out to them. They were very understanding and together we resolve the issue.

Review.Titre: Everything was as promised and speedy
Review.Contenu: Everything was as promised and speedy.  Very happy with the safe.

Review.Titre: A great safe at a very reasonable…
Review.Contenu: A great safe at a very reasonable price. Shipping was ridiculously fast. This was my second vaultek safe, and I will definitely buy more in the future.

Review.Titre: The customer service for Vaultek is…
Review.Contenu: The customer service for Vaultek is very impressive. I had to play phone tag for a day due to the time difference on the west coast, but they were able to verify a problem with the lock on my Lifepod humidor and ship me a new one. I appreciate the quick response and quick resolution.

Review.Titre: Morgan is an asset to the customer…
Review.Contenu: Morgan is an asset to the customer service team.  Very courteous and professional.  It would be great if there was a hole on the side of the safe in which you could install a multi plug system for the inside in which you could plug-in cell phone charger or a dehumidifier
Excellent product. This is my 4th VAULTEK purchase. Products are great and helps provide the piece of mind that my firearms are easily accessible, but securely and safely stored.

I needed a way to safely have quick access to my pistol at home. We have kids so a safe was the best solution. The Vaultek Slider is the perfect way to keep your gun locked up yet have instantaneous access to it. The finger print scanner works every time and there’s the keypad as a backup. The WiFi connected safe lets you know if someone is trying to access your safe no matter where you’re at. I highly recommend Vaultek.
Well made product, delivered on time, products worked exactly as expected.

Great product. Setup wasn’t that bad. It took me some time to realize the app set the clock time. Love the ease of accessibility both biometric and combination. Great piece for the night stand as I put the phone down on it at night and have wireless charging.
Just an incredible product with amazing customer support to go on top of it!  These are the only Safes I will buy.

Review.Titre: I needed help to reset the Master Code…
Review.Contenu: I needed help to reset the Master Code to pair a couple of slider safes to the phone app as I could not remember it. The support staff was very helpful but most of all extremely patient with me. Best customer service experience I have had in years. Great job Vaultek staff!
This my second safe I really like this one  as well , I like all the features and the nano 2.0
Great quality. Gifted it to a loved one

Review.Titre: Very easy to carry weapons while traveling .
Review.Contenu: The ease of purchase, the communications with the support staff( answering all Emails within 2 hours or less. ) next time I’ll be dealing directly within their website (and not relying on Amazon. ) I purchased this mainly for travel, to keep guns safe and nearby. Not worrying about leaving them in truck overnight .Wish Amazon had all the models available , I had to purchase accessories to level up . Looking forward to next travel season to put to the test . It’s just the right size for carrying in and out of hotels etc. it was easy to set up, program etc. Instructions was easy to understand. Very well packaged for delivery. For a longer review I made see Amazon review section . John M.
Great hardware and great customer service. I have one for each of my cars, in case I travel somewhere that disallows my CCW.

Review.Titre: I had a latch break on my life pod…
Review.Contenu: I had a latch break on my life pod safe. I ordered two and received two but they were for the 2.0 version so they were too wide. I emailed Vaultek. I got a response back within an hour half to 2 hours days they would send the original Lifepod latches to me as quickly as they can. To me, this is top-notch customer service.
Great design. Fantastic way to store my firearm safely and still allow quick access to it.  I highly recommend their products.
It works just fine and is compact so that you can move it around easily or place in a back pack or shoulder bag with no problem.

I encountered an issue when attempting to change the pin on my Vaultek Life Pod. Despite following the instructional video and trying various troubleshooting steps, the reprogram button seemed unresponsive. I decided to reach out to Vaultek for assistance, and I was pleasantly surprised by their quick response, which came within a few hours, if not sooner.Todd and the support team at Vaultek went above and beyond to help me resolve my problem, even though my device was no longer under warranty. I'm genuinely grateful for the outstanding customer support provided by Vaultek, which led to a resolution in less than a week – to be precise, it took just three days to find a solution that left me extremely satisfied. I can't emphasize enough the exceptional level of service and support I received from the Vaultek team; they truly stand behind their products!

Review.Titre: Well made with quality materials and a…
Review.Contenu: Well made with quality materials and a very nice design. It serves its purpose, holds my EDC firearm safe and secured right by my bedside. Good purchase

I thought I lost the keys to my life pod safe. I found them but still couldn’t reset my pass code. thought I was doing everything I could. I reached out to Support three different times via email. They responded quickly to each one and asked me to send a video of what I was doing. When they realized that I was being an idiot, lol thatI wasn’t doing it right; they gave me step-by-step instructions on how to reset my pass code and it was so simple and it worked. I will definitely be purchasing more items I already own two safes from them. Thank you for being so kind, nonjudgmental thanks for helping me get through this stressful situation, happy shooting, pew, pew.
Great product, shipped quickly, and good tracking information was provided promptly.
The Vaultek lifepod2 humidor is exceptionally well built, the packaging that it comes in is top notch. It really is a beautiful humidor. Very impressed and will buy from Vaultek again.

Review.Titre: I’m very satisfied with my Vaultek…

Customer service is very prompt and helpful and clarified the one question I did have.  When I had a single accessory to return, the return process was equally easy and convenient.  All this plus a fantastic product will make me a repeat customer!

Review.Contenu: I did a lot of research before buying.  Needed something simple and reliable that was not biometric for my wife.  This Vaultek Slider is exactly as advertised.  I am very satisfied with my purchase.

I called Vaultek and it was no problem at all. I had the handle in 2 days. Thanks for the awesome safe as well as the customer service.
Merch is top notch. Solid construction. Nice design.  Le service client est bon.

Review.Titre: Shipping was fast and the product is well made.
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast and the product is very well made. I love the color. I was looking for a gun safe with a biometric lock and key for backup. But most of all I love that you can use a cord to give the lock enough juice to use if the battery dies.
